å®ç°äº†ä½†æ²¡å®Œå…¨å®ç°ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚

ä½¿ç”¨çš„ ES6 çš„ class æ–¹å¼å®ç°çš„ã€‚
å‚è€ƒæ˜é‡‘ä½œè€… Sunshine_Lin çš„å®ç°ï¼Œé“¾æ¥åœ¨æœ¬æ–‡æœ«å°¾ã€‚

å®ç°æ„é€ å™¨

è¦ç‚¹ï¼š

  1. promise æœ‰ä¸‰ä¸ªçŠ¶æ€ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯ pending fulfilled rejectedï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å®ä¾‹éœ€è¦ä¸€ä¸ªä¿å­˜è¿™ä¸ªçŠ¶æ€çš„å˜é‡ã€‚
  2. promise éœ€è¦ä¿å­˜æ‰§è¡Œåçš„ç»“æœï¼Œåˆéœ€è¦ä¸€ä¸ªå˜é‡ä¿å­˜ã€‚
  3. æ‰§è¡Œå™¨ exec é‡ŒæŠ¥é”™æ—¶ï¼ŒæŠ›å‡ºå¼‚å¸¸ï¼Œpromise éœ€è¦å˜ä¸º rejected çŠ¶æ€

å®ç°ï¼š

class MyPromise {    constructor(exec) {        this.promiseResult = undefined;        this.promiseState = 'pending';        try {            exec(this.resolve, this.reject);        } catch (e) {            this.reject(e)        }    }}

å®ç° resolve å’Œ reject

è¦ç‚¹ï¼š

  1. promise ç”± pending å˜ä¸º fulfilled æˆ–è€… rejected åï¼Œå°± settle äº†ä¸ä¼šå†å˜äº†
  2. è¦å°† resolve å’Œ reject çš„ this ç»‘å®šï¼Œé˜²æ­¢è·Ÿéšæ‰§è¡Œç¯å¢ƒå‘ç”Ÿå˜åŒ–

å®ç°ï¼š

class MyPromise {    constructor(exec) {       // ...    }    resolve = (value) => {        if (this.promiseState === 'pending') {            this.promiseResult = 'fulfilled'            this.promiseState = value;        }    }    reject = (reason) => {        if (this.promiseState === 'pending') {            this.promiseResult = 'rejected';            this.promiseState = reason;        }    }}

å®ç°åŒæ­¥çš„ then

è¦ç‚¹ï¼š

  1. å› ä¸º then çš„ä¸¤ä¸ªå‚æ•°å¯ä»¥çœç•¥, æ‰€ä»¥éœ€è¦åˆ¤æ–­å¹¶è®¾ç½®é»˜è®¤å€¼
  2. æ ¹æ® promise çš„çŠ¶æ€æ‰§è¡Œ then çš„ä¸åŒçš„å‡½æ•°

å®ç°ï¼š

class MyPromise {    // ...    then = (onFulfilled, onRejected) => {        // å› ä¸º then çš„ä¸¤ä¸ªå‚æ•°å¯ä»¥çœç•¥, æ‰€ä»¥éœ€è¦åˆ¤æ–­        onFulfilled = typeof onFulfilled === 'function' ? onFulfilled : val => val;        onRejected = typeof onRejected === 'function' ? onRejected : reason => { throw reason };        if (this.promiseState === 'fulfilled') {            onFulfilled(this.promiseResult)        }        if (this.promiseState === 'rejected') {            onRejected(this.promiseResult)        }    }}

åŒæ­¥çš„ thenï¼Œæ— æ³•å¤„ç†å¼‚æ­¥ä»»åŠ¡ä¸­çš„ resolve å’Œ rejectï¼Œå› ä¸ºåŒæ­¥æ‰§è¡Œæ—¶ promiseState è¿˜åœ¨ pending çŠ¶æ€ã€‚ä¸ä¼šæ‰§è¡Œ onFulfilled æˆ–è€… onRejected å‡½æ•°ã€‚

å®ç°å¼‚æ­¥çš„ then

å¦‚ä½•ä¿è¯ then æ–¹æ³•æ˜¯åœ¨ resolve æˆ–è¿™ reject åæ‰æ‰§è¡Œ?
è¿˜éœ€è¦åœ¨ then åšåŠŸå¤«ï¼Œæ—¢ç„¶åŒæ­¥æ‰§è¡Œæ—¶ promiseState è¿˜åœ¨ pending çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œå°±å†åŠ ä¸€ä¸ª if åˆ¤æ–­ï¼Œå½“ promise çŠ¶æ€ä¸º pending æ—¶æ‰§è¡Œ thenï¼Œåˆ™å°†å½“å‰ then æ–¹æ³•ä¼ å…¥çš„çš„ onFulfilled å‡½æ•°å’Œ onRejected å‡½æ•°æ”¾å…¥ promise å®ä¾‹çš„æ‰€ç»´æŠ¤çš„æ•°ç»„ä¸­ï¼ˆæˆ‘å‘ç°ä½¿ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªå˜é‡ä¿å­˜ä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°å°±å¯ä»¥ï¼Œæƒ³ä¸åˆ°ä¸ºå•¥ç”¨æ•°ç»„ï¼Œéš¾é“æœ‰å¤šæ¬¡ thenï¼Œè€Œä¸”ç¬¬äºŒæ¬¡ then æ—¶ï¼Œpromise è¿˜æ˜¯ pending çŠ¶æ€ï¼Ÿæœ‰è¿™ç§åœºæ™¯ï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼Ÿï¼‰ã€‚
æ”¾å…¥æ•°ç»„çš„å‡½æ•°ï¼Œåœ¨ resolve æˆ–è€… reject çœŸæ­£æ‰§è¡Œçš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œæ‰ä¼šè¢«æ‰§è¡Œï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶å°±æ‹¿å‡ºæ•°ç»„çš„ onFulfilled å‡½æ•°å’Œ onRejected å‡½æ•°ï¼Œä¾æ¬¡æ‰§è¡Œã€‚
è¦ç‚¹ï¼š

  1. æ·»åŠ å®ä¾‹å˜é‡ï¼Œä¿å­˜åœ¨ promise ä¸º pending çŠ¶æ€æ—¶ï¼Œthen è¢«è°ƒç”¨æ—¶ä¼ å…¥çš„å‡½æ•°å‚æ•°
  2. åœ¨ resolve å’Œ reject å†…è°ƒç”¨è¿™äº›æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

å®ç°ï¼š

class MyPromise {    constructor(exec) {        this.promiseResult = undefined;        this.promiseState = 'pending';        // this.onFulFilledCallback = [];        // this.onRejectedCallback = [];        // å¥½åƒä¸ç”¨æ•°ç»„ä¹Ÿè¡Œ...        this.onFulFilledCallback = null;        this.onRejectedCallback = null;        try {            exec(this.resolve, this.reject);        } catch (e) {            this.reject(e)        }    }    resolve = (value) => {        if (this.promiseState === 'pending') {            this.promiseState = 'fulfilled'            this.promiseResult = value;            // console.log(this.onFulFilledCallback.length);            // this.onFulFilledCallback.shift()(value)            if (this.onFulFilledCallback) {                this.onFulFilledCallback(value)            }        }    }    reject = (reason) => {        if (this.promiseState === 'pending') {            this.promiseState = 'rejected';            this.promiseResult = reason;            if (this.onRejectedCallback) {                this.onRejectedCallback(reason)            }        }    }    then = (onFulfilled, onRejected) => {        // å› ä¸º then çš„ä¸¤ä¸ªå‚æ•°å¯ä»¥çœç•¥, æ‰€ä»¥éœ€è¦åˆ¤æ–­        onFulfilled = typeof onFulfilled === 'function' ? onFulfilled : val => val;        onRejected = typeof onRejected === 'function' ? onRejected : reason => { throw reason };        if (this.promiseState === 'fulfilled') {            onFulfilled(this.promiseResult);        }        if (this.promiseState === 'rejected') {            onRejected(this.promiseResult);        }        if (this.promiseState === 'pending') {            // this.onFulFilledCallback.push(onFulfilled);            // this.onRejectedCallback.push(onRejected);            this.onFulFilledCallback = onFulfilled;            this.onRejectedCallback = onRejected;        }    }}

å®ç°å¯é“¾å¼è°ƒç”¨çš„ then

è¦ç‚¹ï¼š

  1. then ä¼šè¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„ promise å®ä¾‹
  2. åŸæ¥çš„ then çš„å¤„ç†éœ€è¦ â€œé€šçŸ¥â€ åˆ°æ–°çš„ promise å®ä¾‹
  3. å¦‚æœ then çš„å‡½æ•°å‚æ•°çš„è¿”å›å€¼æ˜¯ promise, é‚£ä¹ˆæ–°çš„ promise å®ä¾‹è¿”å›çš„çŠ¶æ€å–å†³äºè¿™ä¸ª promise
  4. å¦‚æœè¿”å›å€¼é promise, æ–° promise å¯¹è±¡å°±æ˜¯ fulfilled, ä¸”å€¼ä¸ºæ­¤è¿”å›å€¼

å®ç°ï¼š

class MyPromise {    constructor(exec) {        this.promiseResult = undefined;        this.promiseState = 'pending';        this.onFulFilledCallback = [];        this.onRejectedCallback = [];        try {            exec(this.resolve, this.reject);        } catch (e) {            this.reject(e)        }    }    resolve = (value) => {        console.log('resolve:', value, '|', this.onFulFilledCallback);        if (this.promiseState === 'pending') {            this.promiseState = 'fulfilled'            this.promiseResult = value;            while (this.onFulFilledCallback.length) {                console.log('this.onFulFilledCallback.length:', this.onFulFilledCallback.length);                this.onFulFilledCallback.shift()(this.promiseResult)            }        }    }    reject = (reason) => {        if (this.promiseState === 'pending') {            this.promiseState = 'rejected';            this.promiseResult = reason;            while (this.onRejectedCallback.length) {                this.onRejectedCallback.shift()(this.promiseResult)            }        }    }    then = (onFulfilled, onRejected) => {        // å› ä¸º then çš„ä¸¤ä¸ªå‚æ•°å¯ä»¥çœç•¥, æ‰€ä»¥éœ€è¦åˆ¤æ–­å¹¶è®¾ç½®é»˜è®¤å€¼        onFulfilled = typeof onFulfilled === 'function' ? onFulfilled : val => val;        onRejected = typeof onRejected === 'function' ? onRejected : reason => { throw reason };        // æ”¾åˆ° thenPromise é‡Œäº†        // if (this.promiseState === 'fulfilled') {        //     onFulfilled(this.promiseResult);        // }        // if (this.promiseState === 'rejected') {        //     onRejected(this.promiseResult);        // }        // if (this.promiseState === 'pending') {        //     this.onFulFilledCallback.push(onFulfilled);        //     this.onRejectedCallback.push(onRejected);        // }        let thenPromise = new MyPromise((res, rej) => {            // console.log(this.promiseState);            // æ­¤å‡½æ•°æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç®­å¤´å‡½æ•°, exec ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ç®­å¤´å‡½æ•°, æ‰€ä»¥ resolvePromise å£°æ˜æ—¶å°±ä¼šç»‘å®šåˆ°å¤–é¢çš„ promise, è€Œä¸æ˜¯è¿™ä¸ª promise            const resolvePromise = tt => {                try {                    // è¿™ä¸ª this æ˜¯å¤–é¢çš„, è€Œä¸æ˜¯è¿™ä¸ªæ–°å»ºçš„ MyPromise çš„                    const x = tt(this.promiseResult);  // æ‰§è¡Œ tt å‡½æ•°ï¼Œæ‹¿åˆ°å‡½æ•°æ‰§è¡Œçš„ç»“æœï¼Œæ ¹æ®æ­¤ç»“æœè¿›è¡Œåˆ¤æ–­ã€‚                    if (x === this.thenPromise) {  // è¿™ä¸ªåˆ¤æ–­ä¸æ‡‚ã€‚ã€‚ã€‚                        throw new Error("then è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„ promise è€Œä¸æ˜¯è‡ªèº«")                    }                    if (x instanceof MyPromise) {                        // console.log('here');                        x.then(res, rej);                    } else {                        // é promise æ—¶ primise å®ä¾‹å°±æ˜¯è°ƒç”¨ resolve çš„ fulfilled çš„                        res(x);                    }                } catch (err) {                    rej(err)                }            }            if (this.promiseState === 'fulfilled') {                // onFulfilled(this.promiseResult);                resolvePromise(onFulfilled);            }            if (this.promiseState === 'rejected') {                // onRejected(this.promiseResult);                resolvePromise(onRejected);            }            // resolve æˆ–è€… reject æ˜¯è¢«å¼‚æ­¥è°ƒç”¨çš„            if (this.promiseState === 'pending') {                this.onFulFilledCallback.push(() => {                    resolvePromise(onFulfilled)                });                this.onRejectedCallback.push(() => {                    resolvePromise(onRejected)                });            }        })        return thenPromise;    }}

entry.title: å®ç° Promise - ç¿»è¯‘
entry.content:
æ›´å¥½åœ°ç†è§£ Promise

è‹±æ–‡åŸæ–‡é“¾æ¥

ç”±äº promise åªæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªçŠ¶æ€æœºï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åº”è¯¥é¦–å…ˆå¼•å…¥æˆ‘ä»¬åé¢éœ€è¦çš„çŠ¶æ€ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚

var PENDING = 0;var FULFILLED = 1;var REJECTED = 2;function Promise() {  // çŠ¶æ€å¯ä»¥æ˜¯ PENDING, FULFILLED or REJECTED  let state = PENDING;  // åœ¨çŠ¶æ€å˜ä¸º FULFILLED or REJECTED åï¼Œå­˜å‚¨ value æˆ–è€… error   let value = null;  // é€šè¿‡è°ƒç”¨ .then æˆ–è€… .doneï¼Œå­˜å‚¨æˆåŠŸæˆ–å¤±è´¥çš„ handlers   var handlers = [];}

çŠ¶æ€è½¬å˜

var PENDING = 0;var FULFILLED = 1;var REJECTED = 2;function Promise() {  // çŠ¶æ€å¯ä»¥æ˜¯ PENDING, FULFILLED or REJECTED  let state = PENDING;  // åœ¨çŠ¶æ€å˜ä¸º FULFILLED or REJECTED åï¼Œå­˜å‚¨ value æˆ–è€… error   let value = null;  // é€šè¿‡è°ƒç”¨ .then æˆ–è€… .doneï¼Œå­˜å‚¨æˆåŠŸæˆ–å¤±è´¥çš„ handlers   var handlers = [];  function fulfill(result) {    state = FULFILLED;    value = result;  }  function reject(error) {    state = REJECTED;    value = error;  }}

var PENDING = 0;var FULFILLED = 1;var REJECTED = 2;function Promise() {  // store state which can be PENDING, FULFILLED or REJECTED  var state = PENDING;  // store value once FULFILLED or REJECTED  var value = null;  // store sucess & failure handlers  var handlers = [];  function fulfill(result) {    state = FULFILLED;    value = result;  }  function reject(error) {    state = REJECTED;    value = error;  }  function resolve(result) {    try {      let then = getThen(result);      if (then) {        doResolve(then.bind(result), resolve, reject)        return      }      // then æ˜¯ null æ—¶è°ƒç”¨ fulfillï¼Œå³ result æ˜¯çº¯å€¼æ—¶è°ƒç”¨      fulfill(result);    } catch (e) {      reject(e);    }  }}

var PENDING = 0;var FULFILLED = 1;var REJECTED = 2;function Promise(fn) {  // store state which can be PENDING, FULFILLED or REJECTED  var state = PENDING;  // store value once FULFILLED or REJECTED  var value = null;  // store sucess & failure handlers  var handlers = [];  function fulfill(result) {    state = FULFILLED;    value = result;  }  function reject(error) {    state = REJECTED;    value = error;  }  function resolve(result) {    try {      var then = getThen(result);      if (then) {        doResolve(then.bind(result), resolve, reject)        return      }      fulfill(result);    } catch (e) {      reject(e);    }  }function handle(handler) {    if (state === PENDING) {      handlers.push(handler);    } else {      if (state === FULFILLED &&        typeof handler.onFulfilled === 'function') {        handler.onFulfilled(value);      }      if (state === REJECTED &&        typeof handler.onRejected === 'function') {        handler.onRejected(value);      }    }  }  this.done = function (onFulfilled, onRejected) {    // ensure we are always asynchronous    setTimeout(function () {      handle({        onFulfilled: onFulfilled,        onRejected: onRejected      });    }, 0);  }   doResolve(fn, resolve, reject);}

var canJump = function (nums) {    // if (nums.length === 1) {    //     return true;    // }    let dp = Array(nums.length).fill(0);    dp[0] += nums[0];    let i = 1;    for (; i < nums.length; i++) {        if (i > dp[i - 1]) {            console.log('æ­¤æ—¶ i ä¸º', i);            return false;        }        dp[i] = Math.max((i + nums[i]), dp[i - 1]);        console.log(dp[i]);        if (dp[i] >= nums.length - 1) {            return true;        }    }    // åªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ çš„æƒ…å†µç›´æ¥è¿”å› true    return true};

var uniquePathsWithObstacles = function(obstacleGrid) {    let m = obstacleGrid.length;    let n = obstacleGrid[0].length;    let dp = Array.from(Array(m)).map(() => Array(n).fill(0));    for(let i=0; i<m; i++) {        // æœ‰éšœç¢ç‰©ï¼Œåˆ™åé¢çš„ä¸å¯è¾¾        if (obstacleGrid[i][0] === 1) {            break;        }        dp[i][0] = 1;    }    for(let i=0; i< n; i++) {         // æœ‰éšœç¢ç‰©ï¼Œåˆ™åé¢çš„ä¸å¯è¾¾        if (obstacleGrid[0][i] === 1) {            break;        }        dp[0][i] = 1;    }    for(let i=1; i<m; i++) {        for(let j=1; j< n; j++) {            if (obstacleGrid[i][j] === 1) { // æœ‰éšœç¢ç‰©ï¼Œåˆ™ä¸å¯è¾¾                dp[i][j] = 0;            } else {                dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j] + dp[i][j-1];            }                    }    }    return dp[m-1][n-1];};

function eatBan(arr, h) {    function canEat(k) {        let sumH = 0;        for (let i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) {            if (arr[i] % k === 0) {                sumH += arr[i] / k;            } else {                sumH += Math.ceil(arr[i] / k);            }        }        return sumH > h;    }    let left = 1;  // å­˜åœ¨ä¸€ç§å¯èƒ½, ç«‹é©¬åƒå®Œ: arr=[5], h=4    let right = Math.max(...arr);    // ç‰ˆæœ¬ä¸€ while    while (left < right) {        mid = Math.floor(left + (right - left) / 2);        if (canEat(mid)) {  // å…¨åƒäº†éœ€è¦çš„æ—¶é—´ sumH å¤§äºè­¦å«ä¼‘æ¯æ—¶é—´ h, å³åƒä¸å®Œ, æ‰€ä»¥æ¯æ¬¡è¦å¤šåƒç‚¹, å¢åŠ æœ€å°å€¼            left = mid + 1;  // left æ—¶å¯ä»¥å–åˆ°ä¸ right ç›¸ç­‰çš„å€¼çš„        } else {  // éœ€è¦çš„æ—¶é—´å°äºè­¦å«ä¼‘æ¯æ—¶é—´, æ…¢æ…¢åƒ, ç¼©å‡æœ€å¤§å€¼            right = mid;  // å› ä¸ºæœ€åè§£å‡ºçš„ sumH ä¼šå¤§äºç­‰äº h, æ‰€ä»¥è¿™é‡Œä¸è¦ mid-1 !!!        }    }    // ç‰ˆæœ¬äºŒ while    while (left <= right) {        mid = Math.floor(left + (right - left) / 2);        if (canEat(mid)) {              left = mid + 1;        } else {              right = mid - 1;        }}    // ä¸¤ä¸ªç‰ˆæœ¬éƒ½æ˜¯è¿”å› left    return left;}

// æŠŠ mid*mid === x ä¸ mid*mid < x èåˆfunction mySqrt2(x) {    if (x === 1) {        return x;    }    let left = 2;    let right = Math.floor(x / 2);    // ç‰ˆæœ¬ä¸€çš„ whileï¼Œä¸Šå–æ•´    while (left < right) {        let mid =  Math.ceil(left + (right - left) / 2);        if (mid * mid > x) {            right = mid - 1;        } else {            left = mid;        }    }    // ç‰ˆæœ¬äºŒçš„ whileï¼Œä¸‹å–æ•´    while (left <= right) {        let mid = Math.floor(left + (right - left) / 2);        if (mid * mid > x) {            right = mid - 1;        } else {            left = mid + 1;        }    }    // ä¸¤ç§ç‰ˆæœ¬éƒ½æ˜¯è¿”å› while    return right;  // ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯ right?}

é¢˜ç›®ç»™å®š isBadVersion(version) æ¥å£æ¥åˆ¤æ–­ç‰ˆæœ¬å· version æ˜¯å¦åœ¨å•å…ƒæµ‹è¯•ä¸­å‡ºé”™ã€‚å®ç°ä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°æ¥æŸ¥æ‰¾ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªé”™è¯¯çš„ç‰ˆæœ¬ã€‚å°½é‡å‡å°‘å¯¹è°ƒç”¨ API çš„æ¬¡æ•°ã€‚

var solution = function(isBadVersion) {    /**     * @param {integer} n Total versions     * @return {integer} The first bad version     */     return function(n) {        let left = 1;        let right = n;        while (left < right) {            let mid = left + Math.floor((right - left) / 2);            if (isBadVersion(mid)) {                right = mid;            } else {                left = mid+1;            }        }        console.log(left, right)        return left;    };};

ä¸ºäº†åœ¨å¤´éƒ¨æ’å…¥æ–¹ä¾¿ï¼Œä»£ç ä½¿ç”¨äº†æ— æ•°æ®çš„å¤´ç»“ç‚¹ headã€‚

/** * lru design * @param operators int æ•´å‹äºŒç»´æ•°ç»„ the ops * @param k int æ•´å‹ the k * @return int æ•´å‹ä¸€ç»´æ•°ç»„ */function LRU(operators, limit) {    // å®šä¹‰é“¾è¡¨æ•°æ®ç»“æ„    class Node {        constructor(key, value, next = null) {            this.key = key;            this.value = value;            this.next = next;        }    }    // head ä¸è®¡å…¥é“¾è¡¨æ€»ä¸ªæ•°ï¼Œå…¶ next æŒ‡å‘ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ª node    let head = new Node(Number.MIN_VALUE, Number.MIN_VALUE);    const resArr = [];    for (const [op, k, v] of operators) {        let temp = head.next;        let pre = head;        if (v) { // put            while (temp) {                // key å·²ç»å­˜åœ¨                if (temp.key === k) {                    let node = new Node(k, v);                    // åˆ é™¤æ­¤èŠ‚ç‚¹                    pre.next = temp.next;                    // æ’å…¥æ–°èŠ‚ç‚¹                    let t = head.next;                    head.next = node;                    node.next = t;                    break;                }                pre = pre.next;                temp = temp.next;            }            if (temp === null) {  // key ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œæ’å…¥è¿™ä¸ª key çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹æ—¶ï¼Œéœ€è¦åˆ¤æ–­æ•´ä¸ªé“¾è¡¨æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯æ»¡çš„ï¼                let node = new Node(k, v);                let t = head.next;                head.next = node;                node.next = t;            }        } else { // get æ“ä½œ            while (temp) {                // key å­˜åœ¨                if (temp.key === k) {                    // console.log(temp.value);                    resArr.push(temp.value);                    let node = new Node(k, temp.value);                    // åˆ é™¤æ­¤èŠ‚ç‚¹                    pre.next = temp.next;                    // æ’å…¥æ–°èŠ‚ç‚¹                    let t = head.next;                    head.next = node;                    node.next = t;                    break;                }                pre = pre.next;                temp = temp.next;            }            // æ²¡æ‰¾åˆ°ï¼Œè¿”å› - 1            if (temp === null) {                // console.log(-1);                resArr.push(-1);            }        }        // æˆªæ–­é“¾è¡¨        let i = 1;        temp = head;        while (i <= limit && temp) {            temp = temp.next;            i += 1;        }        if (temp) {            temp.next = null;        }    }    return resArr;}

æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼šO(N)ï¼Œå› ä¸ºæŸ¥æ‰¾ key éœ€è¦éå†é“¾è¡¨ã€‚

function heapify(arr, n, i) {    // n: ä½¿ç”¨çš„ arr é•¿åº¦, ä» 0 å¼€å§‹    // i: å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„ç´¢å¼•ä½ç½®    // arr: ä¸€ç»´æ•°ç»„è¡¨ç¤ºçš„å †    // é€’å½’çš„ç»“æŸæ¡ä»¶    if (i >= n) {        return;    }    let max = i;    const left = 2 * i + 1;    const right = 2 * i + 2;    // æ¯”è¾ƒå…¶å·¦å³èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸è‡ªèº«çš„ä¸‰ä¸ªå€¼, å¾—åˆ°æœ€å¤§å€¼    if (left <= n && arr[left] > arr[max]) {        max = left;    }    if (right <= n && arr[right] > arr[max]) {        max = right;    }    if (max !== i) {        swap(arr, i, max);        heapify(arr, n, max);    } else {        return  // max å°±æ˜¯ i æ—¶ä¸ç”¨è§£äº†, é€€å‡º    }}

function GetLeastNumbers_Solution(input, k) {    // write code here    if (k > input.length) {        return [];    }    function swap(arr, i, j) {        const temp = arr[i];        arr[i] = arr[j];        arr[j] = temp;    }    // ä»ä¸€ä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹, å¼€å§‹è‡ªä¸Šè‡³ä¸‹    function heapify(arr, n, i) {        // n: ä½¿ç”¨çš„ arr é•¿åº¦, ä» 0 å¼€å§‹        // i: å½“å‰èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„ç´¢å¼•ä½ç½®        // arr: ä¸€ç»´æ•°ç»„è¡¨ç¤ºçš„å †        // é€’å½’çš„ç»“æŸæ¡ä»¶        if (i >= n) {            return;        }        let min = i;        const left = 2 * i + 1;        const right = 2 * i + 2;        // æ¯”è¾ƒå…¶å·¦å³èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸è‡ªèº«çš„ä¸‰ä¸ªå€¼, å¾—åˆ°æœ€å¤§å€¼        if (left <= n && arr[left] < arr[min]) {            min = left;        }        if (right <= n && arr[right] < arr[min]) {            min = right;        }        if (min !== i) {            swap(arr, i, min);            heapify(arr, n, min);        } else {            return  // min å°±æ˜¯ i æ—¶ä¸ç”¨è§£äº†, é€€å‡º        }    }    function buildHeap(arr) {        // éœ€è¦å€ŸåŠ© heapify æ–¹æ³•        let last = arr.length - 1;        last = Math.floor((last - 1) / 2);        while (last >= 0) {            heapify(arr, arr.length - 1, last);            last -= 1;        }    }    // å‰ k ä¸ª    function sortByHeap(arr, k) {        buildHeap(arr);        let n = arr.length - 1;        const sortedArr = [];        const stop = n - k;        while (n > stop) {            sortedArr.push(arr[0]);            swap(arr, 0, n);            // ä¸ç”¨æˆªæ–­æ•°ç»„, ç›´æ¥æŠŠ arr é•¿åº¦ "æ”¹æ‰"            heapify(arr, n - 1, 0);            n -= 1;        }        return sortedArr;    }    // console.log(sortByHeap(input, k));    return sortByHeap(input, k);}// const arr = [7, 9, 11, 15, 17, 6, 13];// GetLeastNumbers_Solution(arr, 3)
